subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L decided to spend $10 million to further explore stadium proposals in Los Angeles and Anaheim, a small step toward making a decision about where — and whether — to place a team in Southern California.
snippet: The N.F.L decided to spend $10 million to further explore stadium proposals in Los Angeles and Anaheim, a small step toward making a decision about where — and whether — to place a team in Southern California.
